name: Ayouma
description:
Ayouma was the Captain of Ophidae City's Guard. He was well known for his bravery during the called "Siege of the 1000 days", by the Alkaaran Alliance. When the Alkaaran army began their initial offensive on Ophidae City, he took the role of a soldier and fought well and saved a large number of citizens of Ophidae City.

And that is what saved him of get exiled from Ophidae City, as Sardas hostility towards him was well known in the city. Ayouma was not impressed by Sardas, and Sardas didn't like to have around anybody who wasn't under his control. But Ayouma was not expelled from the city, instead, he was promoted and became Captain again, but this time of the Emperor's Personal Guard.

-- 

AI Portrait, made with a carefully picked prompt, a handcrafted start image, and a chain of several GANS. Delivered to all of you, as is. There are not edits beyond contrast/color correction and some re-focusing.

2024x2024 pixels

300 dpi
